task3
import ast

def sort_file_data():
    with open('myfile.txt', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        data = ast.literal_eval(f.read())
    
    numeric_data = [item for item in data if isinstance(item, (int, float))]
    non_numeric_data = [item for item in data if not isinstance(item, (int, float))]

    sorted_numeric = sorted(numeric_data)
    result = sorted_numeric + non_numeric_data

    with open('myfile.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        f.write(str(result))

    print(result)

sort_file_data()
